creator: fengshunzhang@gmail.com
text: I try all the ways to config fop to support Chinese fonts.But I failed.So,is there someone knows how to config.

creator: psancho.asf@gmail.com
text:
Hi,
please, ask first on FOP-Users list for such question.
Then, if you are facing to a FOP issue or a lack in FOP doc, so you may fill in a bug entry.
Anyway, you have to give *all* details that can help other users to understand what is your problem and give you an appropriate answer.

In your case, you should indicate:
 - used font,
 - FOP version,
 - how do you configure FOP
 - short input XSL-FO file
 - difference between expected and get result
 - etc.

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: do not file bugs for usage questions
